extends CoreDevice

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void downloadLoggedData()
      Triggers a download of synced data using the provided sync listener to provide information about the download.
      void downloadLoggedData(LoggingSyncListener syncListener)
      Deprecated. 
      sync listeners can now be registered globally rather than per-request.
      boolean isDownloadingLoggedData()
      Returns the current download state for this device.
      boolean samplingFrequency(AccelerometerSamplingRate samplingFrequency)
      Sets the sampling frequency for accelerometer sampling if it is enabled.
      Set<RealTimeDataType> supportedRealTimeTypes()
      Returns a set of supported real time types, or null if no types are supported.

    • Method Detail

      • samplingFrequency

        boolean samplingFrequency(AccelerometerSamplingRate samplingFrequency)
        Sets the sampling frequency for accelerometer sampling if it is enabled.
        Parameters:
        samplingFrequency - one value of the AccelerometerSamplingFrequency enumeration.

      • downloadLoggedData

        @Deprecated
void downloadLoggedData(LoggingSyncListener syncListener)
        Deprecated. sync listeners can now be registered globally rather than per-request.
        Triggers a download of synced data using the provided sync listener to provide information about the download.
        Parameters:
        syncListener -

      • downloadLoggedData

        void downloadLoggedData()
        Triggers a download of synced data using the provided sync listener to provide information about the download. Callbacks for sync progress and completion will be provided to the global listeners registered under AbstractDeviceManager.addLoggingSyncListener(LoggingSyncListener listener)

      • isDownloadingLoggedData

        boolean isDownloadingLoggedData()
        Returns the current download state for this device.

      • supportedRealTimeTypes

        Set<RealTimeDataType> supportedRealTimeTypes()
        Returns a set of supported real time types, or null if no types are supported.
        Returns:
        a set of all real time supported by this device.
